headline: McCormick & Company (MKC) Eyes McCormick de Mexico Stakes to Bolster Sales
summary: McCormick & Company Inc. (NYSE:MKC) is one of the best FMCG stocks to invest in. On September 3 at the Barclays 18th Annual Global Consumer Staples Conference 2025, the company reiterated its focus on innovation and digital transformation as it seeks to sustain growth in a highly competitive environment.
